short_summary: Modification of wastewater treatment facility existing storage tank at Halifax Dockyard
description: This project involves the furnishing and provision of all plant, labour,ed equipment, and material to perform the work of mechanical and electrical construction and commissioning services modification and commissioningrep place, which may include the storage of FTS450
tags: Building and facility construction and maintenance services
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

Title: EB144-240839 ITT - DND D200 Metal Finishing - WWTP - Piping Modifications

**Tender Reference**
-------------------

* Reference Number: WS4382624578
* Amendment Number: 0
* Solicitation Number: WS4382624578

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* Publication Date: February 15, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 5, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: February 15, 2024
* Tender Status: Annulled (cancelled)

**Description**
---------------

This tender notice contains a security requirement. The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified suppliers to bid on a contract for mechanical and electrical construction and commissioning services for modifications to the basement drain piping under the steam booth and process piping at the wastewater treatment facility (WWTP) to connect an existing storage tank at the Chemical Cleaning Facility located within Building D200 at the Halifax Dockyard.

The work under this project involves the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment, and material to perform the work. The delivery date for the project is 16 weeks after the contract award, and the estimated value of the contract ranges from $100,001 to $500,000.

**Important Notes**
-------------------

* Bid Security is a requirement for this tender.
* This tender is the result of an Invitation to Qualify and is intended for qualified suppliers only.
* The tender description and requirements are subject to the security requirements outlined in the tender package.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* Contact Name: Adam Beaumaster (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (not available)
* Fax: (not available)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

Please note that this tender notice has been annulled (cancelled), and no further action will be taken. For more information, please contact the contract officer.
